source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 569,849 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 285,829.
Set: Verdant Embrace always grants Insurance! to you and your target for 6 sec and its cooldown is reduced by 4.0 sec.

Transmogrified to:
Grips of the Ringing Deeps

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 8,150 to 9,961 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 302 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to summon Mister Pick-Me-Up for 6 sec, firing a healing beam every 2 sec that jumps between 5 injured allies to restore 135,739 health each.

Overhealing from this effect irradiates allies to deal Nature damage to nearby enemies over 1.5 sec, increased by additional overhealing.
Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
